screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .mltbx file in The MathWorks MATLAB R2023a
screenshot.caption: MLTBX file open in The MathWorks MATLAB R2023a

description: MATLAB is specialized software primarily used by engineers and scientists that features a numerical computing environment and dedicated programming language. While the software comes with many features, you can add tools not packaged with the software via toolboxes. Examples of functionality include image-processing algorithms and mapping algorithms for illustrating geographic data as map displays.

You can access installed toolbox add-ons (MLTBX files) by selecting Add-Ons → Manage Add-Ons in the "HOME" tab. Additionally, to create an MLTBX file with MATLAB, select Add-Ons → Package Toolbox in the "HOME" tab, then click Package .
